channel.title: Str on R for the rest of us
channel.description: Recent content in Str on R for the rest of us

item.title: Str Function
item.description: Str function The str function lets you take a look at the underlying structure of your data object. This function is useful for troubleshooting. I was having fun with factors and was able to compare my factor levels from one object to the next. str("object") Using the str function I was able to see the issue and make the corrected change.
